titleStmt.title: Incomparable company-keeping, or A conversation on earth in heaven. Held forth in sundry sermons which are now digested into a treatise. / By William Bell, Mr of arts, and pastor of the church at Highton in Lancashire.
titleStmt.author: Bell, William, 1606 or 7-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for George Eversden at the Maiden-head in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] 11"; the 7 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "6".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
